Package ru.vorobyov.socialmediaapi.service.jwt

Class AuthService

java.lang.Object
ru.vorobyov.socialmediaapi.service.jwt.AuthService
@Service public class AuthService extends Object
The type Auth service for operation related to authentication.

      userService - the user service
      jwtProvider - the jwt provider
      refreshTokenService - the refresh token service

  • Method Details

    • login

      public LoginResponse login(@NonNull LoginRequest authRequest) throws jakarta.security.auth.message.AuthException
      Accepts a DTO request with data for authorization and, if successful, returns a DTO with generated tokens.
      Parameters:
      authRequest - DTO request with data for authorization
      Returns:
      DTO with access and refresh tokens
      Throws:
      jakarta.security.auth.message.AuthException - throws if user not found or password does not match

    • register

      public boolean register(@NonNull RegisterRequest request)
      Accepts a DTO request with data for registration and, if successful, returns true.
      Parameters:
      request - DTO request with data for registration
      Returns:
      true if registration is successful and false otherwise

    • getAccessToken

      public NewAccessTokenResponse getAccessToken(@NonNull String refreshToken, @NonNull String accessToken) throws jakarta.security.auth.message.AuthException
      Gets new access token by refresh token and accessToken.
      Parameters:
      refreshToken - the refresh token
      accessToken - the access token (may be expired)
      Returns:
      new access token
      Throws:
      jakarta.security.auth.message.AuthException - throws if user of refresh token not found

    • getNewRefreshToken

      public NewRefreshTokenResponse getNewRefreshToken(@NonNull String oldRefreshToken)
      Gets new refresh token by old refresh token.
      Parameters:
      oldRefreshToken - old refresh token
      Returns:
      new refresh token

    • getAuthInfo

      public JwtAuthentication getAuthInfo()
      Gets info of authorized user.
      Returns:
      authorized user info model
